attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am for I.D. cards and think that all citizens should carry them from 16 years onwards - this would help with national security,but the under age drinkers would suffer, this may be a good thing.If you have nothing to hide, I don't think you should be opposed to ID cards.

rejection.details: The title of your petition must be a request for an action, not simply your name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
